text: @NYGovCuomo You can t step away from your direction to re admit covid19 patients back to nursing homes. Why would you do that. You had Comfort, Javitts and Samaritan Purse field hospital. No excuse. Don t ever point fingers or make decisions including wearing a worthless mask
